class.name: MediaPipeImageSegmenter
class.description: MediaPipe vision task for performing segmentation on the given image.

method.name: get_labels
method.description: Get the list of category label that the image segmenter can recognize.

method.name: segment
method.description: Performs image segmentation on [param image]. Only use this method when the task is initialized with [constant MediaPipeVisionTask.RUNNING_MODE_IMAGE].

method.name: segment_async
method.description: Sends [param image] to perform image segmentation. Only use this method when the task is initialized with [constant MediaPipeVisionTask.RUNNING_MODE_LIVE_STREAM].

method.name: segment_video
method.description: Performs image segmentation on video frame [param image]. Only use this method when the task is initialized with [constant MediaPipeVisionTask.RUNNING_MODE_VIDEO].

signal.name: result_callback
signal.description: Emitted when image segmenter initialized with [constant MediaPipeVisionTask.RUNNING_MODE_LIVE_STREAM] returns segmentation result.
